fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Trade, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
We are especially interested in social justice, equal rights and quality of living without discriminations for whatsoever reason of diversity. 
 
We advocate community development based on sustainability goals within the scope of Europe 2020 and the UN Agenda 2030, with environmental conservation as a priority towards erradication of poverty and with social inclusion as our main goal.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: We are a social action non-profit association founded in order to promote equal rights & opportunities with "Persons First" in mind in the widest possible sense of plurality and diversity, without discrimination for whatsoever reason of difference.
relevant_communication: Our website indicates the scope of our varied activities in line with our "3-S policy" (social, sustainable & solidary) which we have transferred to an INTERREG proposal dubbed as "SOCIAL INNOVA" and led by a local municipality, with widespred EU participation.
